channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: California Democrats unveil their new congressional map to counter Republicans
item.description: As the battle over partisan redistricting mounts, Democrats in California unveil a congressional map that could yield up to five new seats for their p...

item.title: Class-action suit claims Otter AI secretly records private work conversations
item.description: The suit claims the popular service may be recording and processing millions of users' private conversations without consent.

item.title: 8/15: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: President Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin hold a summit in Alaska; Iowa Gov. Kim Reynolds directs the Iowa National Guard to aid in immigra...

item.title: Erin strengthens into hurricane, the first of 2025 Atlantic season
item.description: Erin is the first hurricane to develop over the Atlantic this year, and meteorologists are closely tracking its path and forecast.

item.title: 8/15: The Daily Report
item.description: Nancy Chen reports on a high-stakes summit between President Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin, where the redistricting fight stands in Texas...

item.title: "Devil in the Ozarks" spent 6 months planning prison break, report says
item.description: An internal review reveals that a former police chief, known as the "Devil in the Ozarks," spent months planning his escape from an Arkansas prison.

item.title: Democrats unveil maps of California's redistricting proposal
item.description: Democrats unveiled a proposal Friday that could give California's dominant political party an additional five U.S. House seats in a bid to win the fig...

item.title: Things to know about the indictment against the New Orleans mayor
When our inflation infeelings donâ€™t match the CPI
item.description: For most Americans, we just lived through the highest period of inflation in our lives. And we are reminded of this every time we go grocery shopping....

item.title: Putin and Trump tout 'progress' despite no Ukraine peace deal
item.description: President Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin are meeting at a military base outside Anchorage, Alaska. We've got the latest.

item.title: After a freeze, Trump administration reluctantly agrees to fund EV chargers
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy says he doesn't agree with federal subsidies for high-speed EV chargers, but that his department "will respect Con...

item.title: Watch: Royals and veterans mark VJ Day 80 years on
item.description: The King and Queen led a two-minute silence at a service in Staffordshire to commemorate 80 years since VJ Day.

item.title: Trump administration agrees to keep DC police chief in place, but with immigration enforcement order
item.description: The Trump administration has reversed course and agreed to leave the Washington, D.C., police chief in control of the department after a court hearing...

item.title: Watch: Moment Trump and Putin meet in Alaska for Ukraine talks
item.description: This is the moment Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin exchange handshakes as they meet for a summit in Alaska.

item.title: New Orleans mayor indicted over allegations of trying to hide relationship with bodyguard
'About our lives, but without our voice': Sidelined Ukrainians look on
item.description: Left uninvited to key talks, many Ukrainians look on with a mix of fatigue and mistrust.

item.title: One dead and several injured as Danish train hits tanker and derails
item.description: Local media report crash at railway crossing in southern Jutland involved lorry transporting farm waste.

item.title: Flash floods kill nearly 200 in Pakistan and Pakistan-administered Kashmir
item.description: The majority of deaths were recorded in Pakistan's mountainous Khyber Pakhtunkhwa area.
